CIPHER.120.cipherString: Imagining is trying to formulate all one would wish to be better, all that surpasses reality.
CIPHER.120.question: A quote by Gabriel Fauré has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.120.author: Gabriel Fauré

CIPHER.109.cipherString: Discipline yourself and others won't need to.
CIPHER.109.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by John Wooden using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text starts with DISC
CIPHER.109.author: John Wooden

CIPHER.110.cipherString: Nothing is less in our power than the heart, and, far from commanding it, we are forced to obey it.
CIPHER.110.question: A quote by Rousseau has been encoded using the K3 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K3 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.110.author: Rousseau

CIPHER.113.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 028 85392 45167. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.100.cipherString: Everything is a subject on which there is not much to be said.
CIPHER.100.question: A quote by C. S. Lewis has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has WHICHT somewhere in it.
CIPHER.100.author: C. S. Lewis

CIPHER.99.cipherString: I am showing my pupils details of an immense landscape which they cannot possibly know their way around.
CIPHER.99.question: A quote by Ludwig Wittgenstein has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K1 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.99.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

CIPHER.103.cipherString: It is little keys that open up big doors. On small steps leading to great achievements.
CIPHER.103.question: The following quote by Lamine Pearlheart needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of MINOR and polybius key of INEXORABLY.
CIPHER.103.author: Lamine Pearlheart

CIPHER.114.cipherString: The power is yours if you seize it make sure each move you take moves you closer to your goals.
CIPHER.114.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.114.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.107.cipherString: Space or science fiction has become a dialect for our time.
CIPHER.107.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Doris Lessing using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.107.author: Doris Lessing

CIPHER.112.cipherString: Puedes verlo, pero en realidad no está allí. Al igual que el final de un arco iris, el horizonte es una ilusión.
CIPHER.112.question: A quote by Holly Ringland which has been translated to Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.112.author: Holly Ringland
CIPHER.112.translation: You can see it, but it's not really there. Just like the end of a rainbow, the horizon is an illusion.

CIPHER.117.cipherString: We would like to live as we once lived, but history will not permit it.
CIPHER.117.question: The following quote by John F. Kennedy needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of SHINE
CIPHER.117.author: John F. Kennedy

CIPHER.98.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 53120 4372 9306. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.108.cipherString: Everything came easy to me in life. I could always shake off difficulties, like water on a duck's wings.
CIPHER.108.question: Hard K2 Aristocrat with a Hint Quote Author: Rita Levi-Montalcini
CIPHER.108.author: Rita Levi-Montalcini

CIPHER.111.question: Decode the following French Proverb which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of TOUT.
CIPHER.111.author: French Proverb

CIPHER.106.cipherString: Our adversaries think they confuse us by repeating their own opinion and paying no heed to ours.
CIPHER.106.question: A quote by Goethe has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. What was the K2 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.106.author: Goethe

CIPHER.102.cipherString: Happy is entirely up to you and always has been.
CIPHER.102.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Janette Rallison using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.102.author: Janette Rallison

CIPHER.105.cipherString: Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness.Listen to it carefully.
CIPHER.105.question: The following quote by Richard Bach needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of SOULED and polybius key of SOUNDTRACK.
CIPHER.105.author: Richard Bach

CIPHER.116.cipherString: Unwinding a habit that you have allowed to entangle you can be difficult. But the power is in you. Do not despair.
CIPHER.116.question: A quote by Boyd K. Packer has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.116.author: Boyd K. Packer

CIPHER.115.cipherString: When the youth of America gets together, amazing things happen.
CIPHER.115.question: A quote by Tom Ford has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with WHENT.
CIPHER.115.author: Tom Ford

CIPHER.119.cipherString: Thinking too well of people often allows them to be better than they otherwise would.
CIPHER.119.question: A quote by Nelson Mandela has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has PEOPLE somewhere in it.
CIPHER.119.author: Nelson Mandela

CIPHER.101.cipherString: To me, thee greatest lpeasure of writign si not hwat its about, ubt the inner umsic that words make.
CIPHER.101.question: A friend of yours tried to encode a quote by Truman Capote as an Aristocrat using a K2 alphabet.  However they turn out to be a terrible speller and typist.  What did they encode?
CIPHER.101.author: Truman Capote

CIPHER.104.cipherString: Never act in breach of trust.
CIPHER.104.question: Decode the following quote by Basava which was encoded as a 2x2 Hill Cipher using a keyword of BOAR.

CIPHER.118.cipherString: Being a leader has allowed me to showcase the power of compassion, kindness, and collective support .
